ldc_scope.charseq: What is the recommended policy on compensating board members for attending meetings, when they have no vacation time left at work, and are attending the board meeting on their own time, without pay

extent.charseq: they have no vacation time left at work, and are attending the board meeting

ldc_scope.charseq: What is the recommended policy on compensating board members for attending meetings, when they have no vacation time left at work, and are attending the board meeting on their own time, without pay
Take a look at any of the large student unions, they all pay their elected board members an honorarium, as do many of the large foundations
